message: Let's get this started! I'll give you 400k, a fair share. Your turn!
You're being too stingy! I'll take 70% and leave you with 30%.
Meet me in the middle! 52% for me, 48% for you. Let's make a deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much! 55% for you, 45% for me, it's a fair compromise.
I'm not backing down! 58% for me, 42% for you. It's time to make a deal!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%, it's my final offer.
